Article.Title: Hands On With The Blackberry Classic
Article.Content: Facebook LinkedIn BlackBerry Classic | Hands On It’s been a long time coming: Blackberry’s return to its roots. Rather than chasing the pack, Blackberry has brought back exactly what its fans have been wanting in a package that is usable, fun, and solid. But can it save the company? I’m a fan of the $450 Classic and will post a full review on Monday but until then I’ve prepared a brief hands on. I’ve found myself reaching for the Classic more and more this weekend and I’m excited to see what it can do.
